Keyword.name: pl
Keyword.desc: PL [expression] / *PL [expression] - output text to an additional / main description window, then a new line

Keyword.name: clear
Keyword.desc: CLEAR / *CLEAR - cleaning additional / the main description window

Keyword.name: clr
Keyword.desc: CLR / *CLR - cleaning additional / the main description window

Keyword.name: p
Keyword.desc: P [expression] / *P [expression] - output text to an additional / main description window

Keyword.name: nl
Keyword.desc: NL [expression] / *NL [expression] - transition to a new line, then output the text to an additional/ main description window

Keyword.name: msg
Keyword.desc: MSG [expression] - output of the message in the information window

Keyword.name: wait
Keyword.desc: WAIT [#expression] - stop execution of the program for a specified number of milliseconds

Keyword.name: act
Keyword.desc: ACT [$variable],[$path to the image]:[operator] & [operator] & ... - adding an action

Keyword.name: delact
Keyword.desc: DELACT [$variable] / DEL ACT [$variable] - deleting an action

Keyword.name: cla
Keyword.desc: CLA - clearing the action list

Keyword.name: cmdclear
Keyword.desc: CMDCLEAR - clearing input line

Keyword.name: cmdclr
Keyword.desc: CMDCLEAR - clearing input line

Keyword.name: cls
Keyword.desc: CLS - clears the screen, leaving only a list of items

Keyword.name: menu
Keyword.desc: MENU [$expression] - displaying a menu with a given name

Keyword.name: settimer
Keyword.desc: SETTIMER [#expression] - specifies the timer interval for the counter location

Keyword.name: dynamic
Keyword.desc: DYNAMIC [$line of code],[parameter 1],[parameter 2], ... - dynamic code execution

Keyword.name: set
Keyword.desc: SET [variable name]=[expression] - setting the value of a variable

Keyword.name: let
Keyword.desc: LET [variable name]=[expression] - setting the value of a variable

Keyword.name: killvar
Keyword.desc: KILLVAR [$name],[#index] - delete all variables / specified variable

Keyword.name: copyarr
Keyword.desc: COPYARR [$array-receiver],[$source array] - copying the contents of an array to another array

Keyword.name: addobj
Keyword.desc: ADDOBJ [$variable],[$path to the image],[#position] / ADD OBJ [$variable],[$path to the image],[#position] - adding an item

Keyword.name: delobj
Keyword.desc: DELOBJ [$variable] / DEL OBJ [$variable] - object removal

Keyword.name: killobj
Keyword.desc: KILLOBJ [#position] - removal of all items / of the item in the given position

Keyword.name: unselect
Keyword.desc: UNSELECT - cancellation of object selection

Keyword.name: unsel
Keyword.desc: UNSEL - cancellation of object selection

Keyword.name: killall
Keyword.desc: KILLALL - delete all variables and items

Keyword.name: opengame
Keyword.desc: OPENGAME [$expression] - Loading the game state

Keyword.name: openqst
Keyword.desc: OPENQST [$expression] - opening and launching a game file

Keyword.name: addqst
Keyword.desc: ADDQST [$expression] - adding locations from the specified file

Keyword.name: killqst
Keyword.desc: KILLQST - delete all added via ADDQST locations

Keyword.name: savegame
Keyword.desc: SAVEGAME [$expression] - preservation of the game state

Keyword.name: refint
Keyword.desc: REFINT - interface update

Keyword.name: showacts
Keyword.desc: SHOWACTS [#expression] - display / hiding action list

Keyword.name: showinput
Keyword.desc: SHOWINPUT [#expression] - display / hiding the input line

Keyword.name: showobjs
Keyword.desc: SHOWOBJS [#expression] - display / hiding a list of items

Keyword.name: showstat
Keyword.desc: SHOWSTAT [#expression] - display / hiding an additional description window

Keyword.name: if
Keyword.desc: IF [#expression]:[operator1] & [operator2] & ... ELSE [operator3] & [operator4] & ... - condition

Keyword.name: else
Keyword.desc: IF [#expression]:[operator1] & [operator2] & ... ELSE [operator3] & [operator4] & ... - condition

Keyword.name: elseif
Keyword.desc: ELSEIF [#expression]:[operator1] & [operator2] & ... - alternate state

Keyword.name: exit
Keyword.desc: EXIT - completion of the current code

Keyword.name: end
Keyword.desc: END - completion of a multi-line form IF / ACT

Keyword.name: jump
Keyword.desc: JUMP [$expression] - go to the specified label

Keyword.name: gosub
Keyword.desc: GOSUB [$expression],[parameter 1],[parameter 2], ... - processing of the specified location

Keyword.name: gs
Keyword.desc: GS [$expression],[parameter 1],[parameter 2], ... - processing of the specified location

Keyword.name: goto
Keyword.desc: GOTO [$expression],[parameter 1],[parameter 2], ... - go to the specified location

Keyword.name: gt
Keyword.desc: GT [$expression],[parameter 1],[parameter 2], ... - go to the specified location

Keyword.name: xgoto
Keyword.desc: XGOTO [$expression],[parameter 1],[parameter 2], ... - go to the specified location without clearing the main description window

Keyword.name: xgt
Keyword.desc: XGT [$expression],[parameter 1],[parameter 2], ... - go to the specified location without clearing the main description window

Keyword.name: play
Keyword.desc: PLAY [$path to an audio file],[#volume] - playing an audio file with a specified volume

Keyword.name: close
Keyword.desc: CLOSE [$path to an audio file] / CLOSE ALL - stop playing a sound file / all sound files

Keyword.name: view
Keyword.desc: VIEW [$path to the graphic file] - image view

Keyword.name: and
Keyword.desc: [#expression 1] AND [#expression 2] - logical "and="

Keyword.name: or
Keyword.desc: [#expression 1] OR [#expression 2] - logical "or"

Keyword.name: obj
Keyword.desc: OBJ [$subject] - checking the presence of an object in a backpack

Keyword.name: loc
Keyword.desc: LOC [$location] - checking the existence of a location

Keyword.name: no
Keyword.desc: NO [#expression] - negation

Keyword.name: mod
Keyword.desc: [#expression 1] MOD [#expression 2] - calculation of the remainder from division

Keyword.name: desc
Keyword.desc: DESC([$expression]) - returns the text of the basic description of the location

Keyword.name: $desc
Keyword.desc: $DESC([$expression]) - returns the text of the basic description of the location

Keyword.name: iif
Keyword.desc: IIF([#expression],[Expression_Yes],[expression_no]) - возвращает одно из выражений по условию

Keyword.name: $iif
Keyword.desc: $IIF([#expression],[Expression_Yes],[expression_no]) - возвращает одно из выражений по условию

Keyword.name: input
Keyword.desc: INPUT([expression]) - shows the text input window and returns the entered value

Keyword.name: $input
Keyword.desc: $INPUT([expression]) - shows the text input window and returns the entered value

Keyword.name: isplay
Keyword.desc: ISPLAY([$expression]) - checks if the specified file is currently playing

Keyword.name: max
Keyword.desc: MAX([expression 1],[expression 2], ...) - returns the maximum of the argument values

Keyword.name: $max
Keyword.desc: $MAX([expression 1],[expression 2], ...) - returns the maximum of the argument values

Keyword.name: min
Keyword.desc: MIN([expression 1],[expression 2], ...) - returns the minimum of the argument values

Keyword.name: $min
Keyword.desc: $MIN([expression 1],[expression 2], ...) - returns the minimum of the argument values

Keyword.name: rand
Keyword.desc: RAND([#expression 1],[#expression 2]) - returns a random number between the given

Keyword.name: rgb
Keyword.desc: RGB([#red],[#green],[#blue]) - returns color code based on 3 components

Keyword.name: getobj
Keyword.desc: GETOBJ([#position]) - returns the name of the item located in the given position

Keyword.name: $getobj
Keyword.desc: $GETOBJ([#position]) - returns the name of the item located in the given position

Keyword.name: dyneval
Keyword.desc: DYNEVAL([$expression],[parameter 1],[parameter 2], ...) - returns the value of the dynamically evaluated expression

Keyword.name: $dyneval
Keyword.desc: $DYNEVAL([$expression],[parameter 1],[parameter 2], ...) - returns the value of the dynamically evaluated expression

Keyword.name: func
Keyword.desc: FUNC([$expression],[parameter 1],[parameter 2], ...) - processing specified location as a function

Keyword.name: $func
Keyword.desc: $FUNC([$expression],[parameter 1],[parameter 2], ...) - processing specified location as a function

Keyword.name: arrsize
Keyword.desc: ARRSIZE([$expression]) - returns the number of elements in the specified array

Keyword.name: arrpos
Keyword.desc: ARRPOS([#starting index],[$array name],[value]) - search in an array of an element with a given value

Keyword.name: instr
Keyword.desc: INSTR([#initial position],[$text],[$search text]) - search for text occurrences

Keyword.name: isnum
Keyword.desc: ISNUM([$expression]) - checks if the specified string is a number

Keyword.name: trim
Keyword.desc: TRIM([$expression]) - removes adjacent spaces and tabs from text

Keyword.name: $trim
Keyword.desc: $TRIM([$expression]) - removes adjacent spaces and tabs from text

Keyword.name: ucase
Keyword.desc: UCASE([$expression]) - converts small letters of text to large

Keyword.name: $ucase
Keyword.desc: $UCASE([$expression]) - converts small letters of text to large

Keyword.name: lcase
Keyword.desc: LCASE([$expression]) - converts large letters of text into small

Keyword.name: $lcase
Keyword.desc: $LCASE([$expression]) - converts large letters of text into small

Keyword.name: len
Keyword.desc: LEN([$expression]) - returns the length of the specified string

Keyword.name: mid
Keyword.desc: MID([$text],[#start],[#length]) - cuts out a string of the specified length starting from the specified location

Keyword.name: $mid
Keyword.desc: $MID([$text],[#start],[#length]) - cuts out a string of the specified length starting from the specified location

Keyword.name: replace
Keyword.desc: REPLACE([$text],[$search text],[$text to replace]) - replaces the specified string in the text

Keyword.name: $replace
Keyword.desc: $REPLACE([$text],[$search text],[$text to replace]) - replaces the specifieed string in the text

Keyword.name: str
Keyword.desc: STR([#expression]) - converts a number to a string

Keyword.name: $str
Keyword.desc: $STR([#expression]) - converts a number to a string

Keyword.name: val
Keyword.desc: VAL([$expression]) - converts a string to a number

Keyword.name: arrcomp
Keyword.desc: ARRCOMP([#starting index],[$array name],[$template]) - search in an array of an element corresponding to a regular expression

Keyword.name: strcomp
Keyword.desc: STRCOMP([$expression],[$template]) - checks the specified text for consistency with a regular expression

Keyword.name: strfind
Keyword.desc: STRFIND([$expression],[$template],[#number]) - returns a substring, corresponding to the group numbered [#number] regular expression

Keyword.name: $strfind
Keyword.desc: $STRFIND([$expression],[$template],[#number]) - returns a substring, corresponding to the group numbered [#number] regular expression

Keyword.name: strpos
Keyword.desc: STRPOS([$expression],[$template],[#number]) - returns the position of the substring, corresponding to the group with the number [#number] regular expression

Keyword.name: countobj
Keyword.desc: COUNTOBJ -returns the current number of items

Keyword.name: msecscount
Keyword.desc: MSECSCOUNT - returns the number of milliseconds, elapsed since the start of the game

Keyword.name: rnd
Keyword.desc: RND - returns a random value from 1 to 1000

Keyword.name: curloc
Keyword.desc: CURLOC - returns the name of the current location

Keyword.name: $curloc
Keyword.desc: $CURLOC - returns the name of the current location

Keyword.name: qspver
Keyword.desc: QSPVER - returns the version of the interpreter

Keyword.name: $qspver
Keyword.desc: $QSPVER - returns the version of the interpreter

Keyword.name: selobj
Keyword.desc: SELOBJ - returns the name of the selected item

Keyword.name: $selobj
Keyword.desc: $SELOBJ - returns the name of the selected item

Keyword.name: selact
Keyword.desc: SELACT - returns the name of the selected action

Keyword.name: $selact
Keyword.desc: $SELACT - returns the name of the selected action

Keyword.name: curacts
Keyword.desc: CURACTS - returns all current actions as code

Keyword.name: $curacts
Keyword.desc: $CURACTS - returns all current actions as code

Keyword.name: user_text
Keyword.desc: USER_TEXT - returns text in the input line

Keyword.name: $user_text
Keyword.desc: $USER_TEXT - returns text in the input line

Keyword.name: usrtxt
Keyword.desc: USRTXT - returns text in the input line

Keyword.name: $usrtxt
Keyword.desc: $USRTXT - returns text in the input line

Keyword.name: maintxt
Keyword.desc: MAINTXT - returns text in the main description window

Keyword.name: $maintxt
Keyword.desc: $MAINTXT - returns text in the main description window

Keyword.name: stattxt
Keyword.desc: STATTXT - returns text in an additional description window

Keyword.name: $stattxt
Keyword.desc: $STATTXT - returns text in an additional description window

Keyword.name: args
Keyword.desc: ARGS - array with procedure parametersarray with procedure parameters / function

Keyword.name: $args
Keyword.desc: $ARGS - array with procedure parameters / function

Keyword.name: result
Keyword.desc: RESULT - the variable contains the result, returned by the current function

Keyword.name: $result
Keyword.desc: $RESULT - the variable contains the result, returned by the current function

Keyword.name: disablescroll
Keyword.desc: DISABLESCROLL - if the variable is not equal to 0, it prohibits auto-scrolling of the text in the output

Keyword.name: disablesubex
Keyword.desc: DISABLESUBEX - if the variable is not equal to 0, it prohibits the use of "subexpressions" in the text

Keyword.name: nosave
Keyword.desc: NOSAVE - if the variable is not equal to 0, the user can not save the game state

Keyword.name: debug
Keyword.desc: DEBUG - if the variable is not equal to 0, then disabling the game ID check when the state is loaded

Keyword.name: $counter
Keyword.desc: $COUNTER - variable contains the name of the location-counter

Keyword.name: $ongload
Keyword.desc: $ONGLOAD - variable contains the name of the location-the state load handler

Keyword.name: $ongsave
Keyword.desc: $ONGSAVE - variable contains the name of the location-a stateful handler

Keyword.name: $onnewloc
Keyword.desc: $ONNEWLOC - variable contains the name of the location-new location handler

Keyword.name: $onactsel
Keyword.desc: $ONACTSEL - variable contains the name of the location-the action selector

Keyword.name: $onobjsel
Keyword.desc: $ONOBJSEL - variable contains the name of the location-object selector handler

Keyword.name: $onobjadd
Keyword.desc: $ONOBJADD - variable contains the name of the location-addon handler

Keyword.name: $onobjdel
Keyword.desc: $ONOBJDEL - variable contains the name of the location-object removal handler

Keyword.name: $usercom
Keyword.desc: $USERCOM - variable contains the name of the location-input line handler

Keyword.name: usehtml
Keyword.desc: USEHTML - if the variable is not equal to 0, then includes the possibility of using HTML

Keyword.name: bcolor
Keyword.desc: BCOLOR - the variable contains the background color

Keyword.name: fcolor
Keyword.desc: FCOLOR - variable contains the main font color

Keyword.name: lcolor
Keyword.desc: LCOLOR - variable contains the main color of links

Keyword.name: fsize
Keyword.desc: FSIZE - variable contains the main font size

Keyword.name: $fname
Keyword.desc: $FNAME - variable contains the name of the main font

Keyword.name: $backimage
Keyword.desc: $BACKIMAGE - the variable contains the path to the background image
